PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05902020-08-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, VI and VII — Seaplane Operations)
PrecisRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, VI AND VII - Seaplane Operations) in order to delay the coming into force of the Regulations until March 6, 2021 to ensure air operators have the financial capacity to acquire personal flotation devices (PFDs), and that PFD manufacturers have adequate supply to fully implement these requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0335 Publication Date: 2020-09-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, VI and VII — Seaplane Operations)
precis: Regulations Amending the Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, VI AND VII - Seaplane Operations) in order to delay the coming into force of the Regulations until March 6, 2021 to ensure air operators have the financial capacity to acquire personal flotation devices (PFDs), and that PFD manufacturers have adequate supply to fully implement these requirements.
